definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Therefore silk is known as "second-skin body" of reputation.
sentences.chinese: 因而蚕丝素有“人体第二肌肤”之美誉。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses a silk floss protective clothing and its production method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种蚕丝绵防护衣及其制作方法。

sentences.english: This is the beauty of candles and silk praise the spirit of selfless dedication.
sentences.chinese: 这是用蜡烛和蚕丝来歌颂赞美无私奉献的精神。

sentences.english: The blue and white Yun silk quilt, exquisite luxury, quiet and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 此款青花雅韵蚕丝被，细腻奢华，安静典雅。

sentences.english: Silk protein membrane methods may replace colloidal immunization methods in the clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 蚕丝蛋白膜法可代替胶体金免疫法在临床应用。

sentences.english: Let more people own paroxysm such as natural silk quilt enjoy for team mission.
sentences.chinese: 让更多的人拥有像蚕丝被那样的终极享受为团队使命。

sentences.english: According to literature, China's royal courts began promoting the use of mulberry silk quilts during the glory days of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 有文献记载，在盛唐时期宫廷里已开始使用蚕丝被。

sentences.english: What suit this season most is thin silk by.
sentences.chinese: 最适合这个季节的就是薄的蚕丝被。

sentences.english: In addition, compared with the untreated one, the thermal stability of the treated silk fiber increased.
sentences.chinese: 热分析测试的结果表明处理后的柞蚕丝热稳定性增强。

sentences.english: Silkworm culture is practised in order to get silk.
It has the advantages of both cashmere and mulberry silk.
sentences.chinese: 它具有羊绒和桑蚕丝两者的优点。

sentences.english: Silk gets its strength from its proteins.
sentences.chinese: 蚕丝的高强性是因为蛋白质。

sentences.english: The silk sacrifice themselves to produce silk which keepd people warm.
sentences.chinese: 春蚕用自己的生命吐出细细的蚕丝，为人们带来温暖。

sentences.english: Shake the quilt heavily every week to recover the fibre elasticity.
sentences.chinese: 每周将蚕丝被大力抖动，使被胎内部纤维恢复弹性。

sentences.english: This paper has studied the spinning and structure properties of regenerated tussah silk fibroin fibers.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了再生柞蚕丝素纤维的制备及其结构性能。

sentences.english: The raw material of their dress is natural silk.
sentences.chinese: 红瑶服饰的主要原料当为桑蚕丝。

definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
item made from woven silk or rayon
